metadata.name: Potential In-Memory Execution Using Reflection.Assembly
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "Reflection.Assembly" load functions to dynamically load assemblies in memory

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('[reflection.assembly]::load')))

output.summary: Detects usage of "Reflection.Assembly" load functions to dynamically load assemblies in memory

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of the library Reference: https://speakerdeck.com/heirhabarov/hunting-for-powershell-abuse?slide=50
